events.title: Research Symposium
events.description: An academic conference for presenting research papers across departments.
events.longdescription: This symposium brings together researchers, academicians, and students to present and discuss their latest research findings across multiple departments. Attendees can participate in paper presentations, panel discussions, and networking sessions, promoting academic collaboration, innovation, and professional development.

events.title: Mathematics Workshop
events.description: Hands-on sessions on advanced mathematical concepts and problem solving.
events.longdescription: The Mathematics Workshop provides participants with in-depth exposure to advanced mathematical concepts through interactive problem-solving sessions. Participants explore algebra, calculus, probability, and applied mathematics while enhancing critical thinking and analytical skills. The workshop fosters collaboration, peer learning, and practical application of theoretical knowledge.

events.title: Science Fair
events.description: Exhibition of innovative scientific projects by students across all departments.
events.longdescription: The Science Fair showcases creative scientific projects and experiments developed by students from all departments. Participants demonstrate their understanding of scientific principles and problem-solving abilities. The event includes interactive demonstrations, discussions with experts, and opportunities to gain feedback, fostering curiosity, innovation, and collaborative scientific exploration.

events.title: Literature Seminar
events.description: A seminar discussing contemporary literature and critical analysis methods.
events.longdescription: The Literature Seminar provides an immersive environment for exploring contemporary literature and critical methods. Participants engage in interactive discussions, analyze texts, and explore literary themes and genres. The seminar fosters analytical skills, creative thinking, and cultural appreciation, offering insights from expert speakers and opportunities for networking with literature enthusiasts.

events.title: Annual Tech Fest
events.description: A grand technical festival featuring coding competitions, robotics challenges, and tech talks from industry experts.
events.longdescription: The Annual Tech Fest is a comprehensive technical festival designed to engage students in coding, robotics, and technology innovation. Attendees participate in competitions, workshops, and interactive sessions led by industry experts. The festival encourages problem-solving, creativity, and practical application of technical knowledge, while providing a platform for networking and professional development in technology fields.

events.title: Workshop on AI
events.description: An intensive workshop covering fundamentals and advanced concepts of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
events.longdescription: The Workshop on AI provides a detailed understanding of artificial intelligence and machine learning principles. Participants engage in hands-on exercises, algorithm development, and data analysis projects. The workshop promotes practical skills, innovation, and critical thinking, preparing students for real-world applications and careers in AI, robotics, and data science.

events.title: Hackathon 2023
events.description: 24-hour coding hackathon for solving real-world problems with innovative solutions.
events.longdescription: Hackathon 2023 challenges participants to solve real-world problems through innovative coding solutions within a 24-hour timeframe. Teams collaborate intensively, applying software development, algorithm design, and problem-solving skills. The event promotes creativity, technical expertise, teamwork, and networking, fostering a competitive yet collaborative environment for aspiring programmers and developers.

events.title: Cyber Security Seminar
events.description: A seminar on ethical hacking, cyber laws, and digital forensics by industry experts.
events.longdescription: The Cyber Security Seminar provides insights into ethical hacking, cyber laws, and digital forensics. Participants learn about security protocols, risk management, and threat detection from industry professionals. The seminar enhances awareness, technical skills, and critical thinking in cybersecurity, offering networking opportunities and practical knowledge applicable to technology and business environments.

events.title: Cultural Night
events.description: An evening filled with music, dance, and theatrical performances.
events.longdescription: Cultural Night is an immersive event showcasing music, dance, and theater performances by students. It celebrates diversity, creativity, and artistic expression, while fostering a sense of community. Attendees enjoy live performances, cultural exhibitions, and interactive experiences, promoting appreciation of the arts and teamwork among participants.

events.title: Art Exhibition
events.description: An exhibition showcasing creative artwork and paintings by Fine Arts students.
events.longdescription: The Art Exhibition highlights the creativity and talent of Fine Arts students. Visitors can explore paintings, sculptures, and mixed media works while interacting with artists. The event encourages artistic expression, critical appreciation, and engagement with contemporary art trends, providing an educational and inspirational experience for all attendees.

events.title: Photography Contest
events.description: A competition capturing the beauty of campus life and creative themes.
events.longdescription: The Photography Contest encourages students to capture creative and meaningful images representing campus life and various themes. Participants showcase technical skills, artistic vision, and storytelling through photography. Judges provide feedback and recognition, promoting learning, creativity, and appreciation of visual arts.

events.title: Drama Festival
events.description: Stage plays and skits performed by the drama society.
events.longdescription: The Drama Festival features performances of stage plays, skits, and dramatic arts by student groups. It fosters creativity, public speaking, and teamwork. Attendees experience storytelling, acting techniques, and cultural expression, highlighting the talents and dedication of the drama society while promoting artistic appreciation across the campus.

events.title: Annual Sports Meet
events.description: Competitions in cricket, football, basketball, and athletics.
events.longdescription: The Annual Sports Meet hosts a variety of sports competitions including cricket, football, basketball, and athletics. Students participate in friendly and competitive matches, promoting teamwork, physical fitness, and sportsmanship. The event provides opportunities for student engagement, leadership, and celebration of athletic achievement.

events.title: Cricket Tournament
events.description: Inter-department cricket matches with trophy and prizes.
events.longdescription: The Cricket Tournament features competitive inter-department cricket matches, allowing students to showcase their athletic abilities, teamwork, and sportsmanship. Participants compete for trophies and recognition while promoting camaraderie and healthy competition among departments.

events.title: Football Championship
events.description: Annual football tournament with multiple college teams.
events.longdescription: The Football Championship brings together multiple college teams for a competitive tournament. Students demonstrate skill, strategy, and team coordination. The event emphasizes athletic development, sportsmanship, and school spirit, while providing an engaging spectator experience for the campus community.

events.title: Basketball League
events.description: Inter-college basketball competition with knockout rounds.
events.longdescription: The Basketball League features knockout-style competitions among college teams, promoting athletic skill, team coordination, and competitive spirit. Participants engage in high-energy games while enhancing fitness, strategy, and sportsmanship. Spectators enjoy dynamic matches and support campus sports culture.

events.title: Badminton League
events.description: Inter-college badminton competition with mixed doubles.
events.longdescription: The Badminton League brings together students from different colleges to participate in singles, doubles, and mixed doubles. The event promotes agility, reflexes, and sportsmanship while creating a fun and competitive environment.

events.title: Yoga Workshop
events.description: Session on yoga, meditation, and wellness practices.
events.longdescription: The Yoga Workshop introduces students to yoga practices, meditation techniques, and mindfulness. Participants gain skills for stress management, flexibility, and overall wellness. The session emphasizes the importance of physical and mental health for academic and personal growth.

events.title: Blood Donation Camp
events.description: Voluntary blood donation drive with medical check-ups.
events.longdescription: The Blood Donation Camp encourages voluntary donations to help hospitals and patients in need. Medical professionals conduct health check-ups, awareness sessions, and ensure safe procedures. The event fosters social responsibility, compassion, and community engagement.

events.title: Tree Plantation Drive
events.description: Planting saplings for a greener campus.
events.longdescription: The Tree Plantation Drive is an initiative to promote environmental sustainability. Students plant saplings around the campus, contributing to cleaner air and a healthier environment. The activity instills environmental responsibility, teamwork, and awareness of ecological issues.

events.title: Cleanliness Drive
events.description: Awareness campaign and cleaning activity in and around campus.
events.longdescription: The Cleanliness Drive focuses on maintaining hygiene and promoting awareness about waste management. Students participate in cleaning areas around the campus, spreading the message of cleanliness and civic responsibility.

events.title: Entrepreneurship Summit
events.description: Talks and workshops on startups, innovation, and leadership.
events.longdescription: The Entrepreneurship Summit gathers budding entrepreneurs, investors, and mentors to discuss innovation, business models, and leadership. Students learn about startup culture, pitching ideas, and networking opportunities to build their entrepreneurial skills.

events.title: Alumni Meet
events.description: Reunion of alumni with interactive sessions and cultural programs.
events.longdescription: The Alumni Meet reconnects past graduates with the college community, providing opportunities for networking, mentorship, and sharing experiences. The event includes cultural programs, panel discussions, and informal gatherings to strengthen alumni relations.

events.title: Fest Inauguration
events.description: Opening ceremony of the annual fest with chief guest.
events.longdescription: The Fest Inauguration marks the beginning of the annual cultural and technical fest. It features welcome speeches, cultural performances, and the presence of chief guests and dignitaries. The event builds excitement and sets the tone for the fest.

events.title: Robotics Challenge
events.description: Robotics competition with autonomous bots and live demo.
events.longdescription: The Robotics Challenge involves designing and programming autonomous robots to perform specific tasks. Participants showcase innovation, problem-solving, and engineering skills. The live demos attract spectators and encourage technical learning.

events.title: Science Exhibition
events.description: Exhibition of innovative science projects and models.
events.longdescription: The Science Exhibition showcases innovative models, experiments, and projects developed by students across disciplines. Visitors engage with interactive displays and learn about scientific principles and applications.

events.title: Math Quiz
events.description: Inter-college quiz competition on problem-solving and puzzles.
events.longdescription: The Math Quiz challenges participants with logical puzzles, problem-solving rounds, and rapid-fire questions. The event sharpens analytical thinking and mathematical skills, encouraging teamwork and quick decision-making.

events.title: Debate Competition
events.description: Debating contest on current social and political issues.
events.longdescription: The Debate Competition provides a platform for students to express their opinions and argue logically on current topics. It improves public speaking, critical thinking, and persuasion skills, while encouraging awareness of social issues.

events.title: Business Strategy Summit
events.description: A case competition testing strategic problem-solving skills.
events.longdescription: The Business Strategy Summit invites students to compete in solving real-world business cases. Teams present innovative strategies to panels of industry experts, gaining exposure, confidence, and practical knowledge.

events.title: Entrepreneurship Fair
events.description: Students showcase their startup ideas and prototypes.
events.longdescription: The Entrepreneurship Fair provides a platform for aspiring student entrepreneurs to pitch ideas, display prototypes, and network with investors and mentors. The event fosters creativity, innovation, and collaboration across the business community.

events.title: Marketing Mania
events.description: A creative contest in advertising and brand strategy.
events.longdescription: Marketing Mania challenges students to design impactful campaigns, advertisements, and branding strategies. Teams showcase creativity while applying marketing theories in a real-world inspired contest judged by professionals.

events.title: Finance Forum
events.description: Workshops and talks on finance, investments, and markets.
events.longdescription: The Finance Forum brings industry leaders and academicians together to conduct workshops and lectures on investment strategies, stock markets, and financial planning. Students gain practical exposure and insights into the financial world.

events.title: Quantum Mechanics Workshop
events.description: Interactive sessions on quantum theory and applications.
events.longdescription: The Quantum Mechanics Workshop introduces students to the fascinating world of quantum theory. Experts explain practical applications like quantum computing, cryptography, and advanced particle research in an engaging environment.

events.title: Astrophysics Seminar
events.description: Talks on galaxies, black holes, and cosmic discoveries.
events.longdescription: The Astrophysics Seminar features lectures from leading astronomers about galaxies, black holes, and cosmic exploration. Students gain deep insights into the universe, astronomy tools, and ongoing space missions.

events.title: Literary Festival
events.description: A celebration of literature, poetry, and creative writing.
events.longdescription: The Literary Festival brings together writers, poets, and students to celebrate creativity through readings, workshops, and competitions. It encourages young talent to express themselves and connect with literary traditions.

events.title: Drama Night
events.description: Stage performances showcasing plays and student talent.
events.longdescription: Drama Night highlights the theatrical talents of English department students through stage plays, skits, and performances. The event fosters creativity, confidence, and artistic expression in an engaging atmosphere.
